meanings: 이성교제 Please don't follow me around anymore.

vlive.korean: [으름장 놓는다 너 동표 입에 다시는 얼쩡 거리지 마라...] 죄송해요... 일억이다! [1 million... I warned you Don't come near to Dongpyo's mouth] Sorry... It's 100 million! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [손동표] 올림포스에 에로스가 있다면 지구엔 사랑둥이 동표가 있거든요💘 (Dongpyo singing number song)
vlive.english: [1 million... I warned you Don't come near to Dongpyo's mouth] Sorry... It's 100 million!

vlive.korean: 강아지가 얼쩡 거리네요. My dog keeps getting in the way. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [루다] Welcome LUDA's Birthday Party🎉
vlive.english: My dog keeps getting in the way.

vlive.korean: 얼쩡 거리다 앞에서... She's moving in the front... 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 동생즈의 발렌타인데이🍫

examples.korean: He didn't sneak around behind your back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 너 모르게 뒤에서 얼쩡거린 건 아니야. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 김석진(peli****)
examples.english: He didn't sneak around behind your back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I shouldn't have accused you of hovering. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 당신이 얼쩡댄다고 고발하지 말았어야 했다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 einky(eink****)
examples.english: I shouldn't have accused you of hovering. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don't cluck around me like an old hen. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 늙은 암탉처럼 꼬꼬댁거리며 내 주변에서 얼쩡거리지마. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 남궁모람(mora****)
examples.english: Don't cluck around me like an old hen. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Someone who could move around without being noticed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 들키지 않고 주변을 얼쩡거릴 수 있었던 누군가 User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 오로라(auro****)
examples.english: Someone who could move around without being noticed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Your recommendation not to go around the president is duly noted. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대통령곁에 얼쩡거리지 말라는 당신의 충고는 충분히 알아들었어. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 wuboshi(ok_h****)
examples.english: Your recommendation not to go around the president is duly noted. Add to Wordbook
